settings.content:
Understanding Purple Mattresses


Welcome to the fascinating world of Purple Mattresses. These aren't your average beds; they're more like cozy wonderlands designed to give you the sleep of your wildest dreams.

Imagine sleeping on a cloud – not a metaphorical cloud nine, but an actual, fluffy cloud. With Purple's innovative technology, that dream can become your nightly reality. The magic of Purple Mattresses lies in their ability to cradle you with comfort and support, like a warm hug from a friend you haven't seen in ages.

But hold on, dreamers, because there's more to explore. Purple Mattresses offer an enchanting selection of collections to suit every type of sleeper. Let's start with the Essential Collection – the dream-maker for budget-savvy sleepers who believe that great sleep shouldn't break the bank. Next up is the Premium Collection, featuring mind-blowing features that'll have you feeling like the VIP of dreamland. And for those who want the ultimate luxury, we present the Luxe Collection – the crème de la crème of mattresses, fit for sleep royalty.

Your sleep needs are as unique as you are, and that's why Purple Mattresses have an intuitive understanding of your personal preferences. Whether you're a back-sleeper, side-sleeper, or a wild tosser-turner, Purple has got your back (literally!). Say goodbye to uncomfortable sleep positions and hello to dreamland bliss.

Now, let's talk about temperature regulation. No more tossing and turning in a sweaty mess. Purple's sleep-cooling technology will have you feeling as cool as an ice cream cone on a hot summer day. Sweet dreams are no longer interrupted by restless heat – just pure, dreamy comfort.

But wait, there's more to this dreamy world! Real customers can't stop raving about their Purple Mattresses. Their reviews and testimonials will make you laugh, cry, and laugh-cry all at once (it's a thing!). Trust me, you'll be convinced that Purple Mattresses are the secret recipe for dreamy nights and bright, refreshed mornings.

So, buckle up for a fantastical sleep adventure, where Purple Mattresses are your magic carpet to dreamland. We've got everything you need to make an informed decision, from pricing and promotions to where to find these enchanting mattresses. Are you ready to dream in purple? Because with Purple Mattresses, there's no such thing as an ordinary sleep. Let's make 2023 your year of dream-filled slumber.

The Essential Collection boasts a variety of firmness options, ensuring you find your perfect level of support and comfort. Enjoy Purple's Hyper-Elastic Polymer grid, which cradles your body like a warm hug, and stay cool with the breathability of the Purple Grid.

settings.content:
Factors to Consider Before Buying a Purple Mattress



The quest for the perfect Purple Mattress. Before you take the plunge into the world of dreamy comfort, let's equip you with the knowledge to make the wisest decision. Here are some crucial factors to consider before you jump into the magical realm of Purple slumber:


Comfort and Support


Your journey to dreamland begins with finding the Goldilocks zone of comfort – not too firm, not too soft, but just right. Consider your preferred sleep position and any specific comfort needs you may have. Whether you're a back-sleeper, side-snoozer, or stomach-slumberer, the perfect Purple Mattress is waiting to cradle you in cloud-like coziness.


Sleeping Positions


Your sleep position is as unique as your personality. Are you a majestic back-sleeper, a cuddly side-sleeper, or a fearless stomach-sleeper? Your sleep style will influence the level of support your mattress should provide. Luckily, Purple has a magic potion for each sleeping preference.

Motion Isolation


If you share your sleep kingdom with a partner, motion isolation becomes your knight in shining armor. No more waking up to every twist and turn; motion isolation technology ensures that your slumber isn't disturbed by your partner's nocturnal adventures.

Edge Support


Do you ever find yourself sitting on the edge of your bed, contemplating life's mysteries or simply putting on your shoes? If so, you'll appreciate the importance of edge support. With Purple, rest assured that every inch of your mattress offers firm and reliable support.

Cooling Technology


Say farewell to sweaty nights with Purple's cooling technology. No more flipping your pillow or kicking off the covers – let Purple's magical cooling powers keep you refreshed and comfortable throughout the night.



Choosing your Purple Mattress is like finding the perfect glass slipper – it needs to fit just right! Consider these factors, and you'll soon find yourself drifting off to dreamland in a mattress made just for you.

Oh, and don't forget – we've got your back (and your mattress)! Our Purple experts are here to assist with any questions or concerns. So, with the right factors in mind, it's time to make 2023 your year of perfect slumber. Sweet dreams await you, dear dreamer.

Real Customer Reviews and Testimonials



Embarking on a mattress adventure without hearing from fellow dreamers would be like setting off on a quest without a trusty sidekick. So, before you choose your Purple Mattress, let's introduce you to some real customer reviews and testimonials. These brave souls have already experienced the magic of Purple, and their stories are nothing short of captivating.



Refreshing, Firm cool Cloud
“My rest is much deeper and rich. I drift off on a firm, cool cloud and now enjoy sleeping through the night. I don’t need to turn and reposition like I used to. Highly recommend to all my friends or anyone who asks."
-Dale N.


Purple Plus is a great mattress.
“Purple Plus works great for me. I’ve had two hip replacements. Most mattresses don’t have the necessary give to make side sleeping comfortable.”
-Linda N.


Happy with the purchase
“My husband and I went back and forth about purchasing a purple mattress for over a year. We both have joint issues and we're skeptical about making such a big purchase online. We finally bought it in July and we are both very impressed. The mattress is definitely firm and can be difficult for side sleeping. However, this mattress has really helped with low back and hip pain. I find that I tend to sleep on my back more often and am comfortable doing so. The bedding is a must. Our bedding arrived a day later than our mattress so we used our old bedding and it was absolutely not as comfortable. You will need bedding that has some stretch to it, this can be a negative aspect of the mattress for some buyers. The purple sheets are very soft and worth the price, in my opinion.”
-Amie


AMAZING!!!
“I did not want to believe the hype that has been surrounding this mattress and brand for all this time, but I finally pulled the trigger and invested in one. I was nervous it was not going to improve my sleep, but it did immediately. I will say it took my body maybe a full week to adjust to it, but now I have no trouble sleeping. I even have the purple pillow! Invest in your health by investing in your sleep!!! I now trust all things Purple!”
-Courtney T.
